tool_description: Track crypto & bitcoin price movements, exchange listings alerts, wallet monitoring and btc network health. Visit https://cryptocurrencyalerting.com/rest-api.html to get an API token.
name: Cryptocurrency Alerting
title: Cryptocurrency Alerting

api_list.name: Create Crypto Alert
api_list.description: Create a new alert (such as a price or percent-change price alert, an exchange listing alert, a wallet monitoring alert or a btc mempool size alert)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-alerting.p.rapidapi.com/v1/alert-conditions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-alerting.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-alerting.p.rapidapi.com/v1/alert-conditions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-alerting.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
